About FaveHosting.com​

FaveHosting.com is a property of Castordor, a registered business in the province of Quebec, Canada. Business number (NEQ): 2275092346
Favehosting was created by a small group of web technicians who worked for another company but decided to create their own. We have many years of web hosting experience you can rely on us for all of your web hosting needs. We may not be a huge corporation but our clients are our highest priority and we can assure you that you won't be treated as just a number. All our clients receive the high priority and personal service that we feel every client deserves.
